question: Nilkanth Khadilkar, who passed away recently, was the noted personality of which field?
explanation: Nilkanth Khadilkar (85) , the noted editor of Marathi newspaper Navakal, has passed away in Mumbai, Maharashtra on 22nd November 2019. He was the editor of the newspaper for 27 years and had gained popularity for his hard-hitting editorials which became the daily\'s popular feature. He was also author of a few books, including \"Practical Socialism: musings from a tour of Russia\".
